column2: "Sorry for calling you out here <%me>."

"I thought that we should talk for a bit,
after all that's happened.
Let's have a little chat."

"So... After you got eaten by Double,
you met Luther inside,
and he helped you escape."

"That sounds truly unbelievable but...
If you're standing right in front of me now,
it must've been true."

"I need to ask, <%me>.
How's you're body holding up?"
"1. Nothing wrong that I can see."
"2. I'm feeling great."

"Just as I suspected...
Matoi also said the same thing."

"If anything, she was feeling great,
and couldn't feel any better."

"Can you count how many Darkers,
and enemies corrupted by Darkers
that you've defeated so far?"

"The answer is
...<%skit_text>
And that number isn't normal at all."

"You and Matoi...
You've been fighting too much."

"You know why people other
than ARKS shouldn't fight Darkers,
right?"

"Because, even if you defeat one,
it leaves remnants behind.
Those will accumulate inside you and will
eventually, corrupt you."

"That's what happened to Naberius Natives,
and the Dragonkin on Amduscia as well."

"Harukotan has the Miko's protection,
which feeds from the corruption process.
Although, it doesn't seem to be foolproof."

"But ARKS members can resist it.
The photon inside an ARKS body will neutralize
the Darker particles."

"However... There's a limit
to what they can do."

"You've destroyed countless Darkers,
purified corrupted native lifeforms,
and driven off mutiple Dark Falz
invasion attempts."

"And then, you've been consumed by a Dark Falz,
and escaped by manifesting
enough power to get out...
I can't even begin to calculate the
effects of that."

"Sorry...
This is beginning to sound awfully threatening right."

"However, Philia and I agree on the opinion
that you go easy from now on."

"If you're just fighting normally,
it shouldn't be a problem.
It's not like you're going to be
severely corrupted or anything."

"Just don't forget,
You're not the only ARKS...
But you ARE the one."

"
You've received the Matterboard: [The destination of my feelings]
"
